channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Publishing Engine
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Publishing Engine

item.title: CVE-2018-1533|2024-09-16T19:05:46.513Z -- ibm -- rational%20publishing%20engine
item.description: IBM Rational Publishing Engine 6.0.5 and 6.0.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 142431.
